code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./Noticias.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Noticias=()=>{const[noticias,setNoticias]=useState([]);const[erro,setErro]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchNoticias=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:4000/api/noticias");if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Erro ao buscar notícias");}const data=await response.json();console.log("Dados recebidos:",data);if(data.articles){setNoticias(data.articles);}else{throw new Error("Formato inesperado de dados");}}catch(error){console.error("Erro ao carregar notícias:",error.message);setErro(error.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchNoticias();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"noticias-container",id:"noticias",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"noticias-titulo",children:"\xDAltimas Not\xEDcias sobre Ciberseguran\xE7a"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"noticias-loading",children:"Carregando not\xEDcias..."}):erro?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"noticias-erro",children:erro}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"noticias-grid",children:noticias.slice(0,3).map((noticia,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"noticia-card",children:[noticia.urlToImage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:noticia.urlToImage,alt:noticia.title,className:"noticia-thumbnail"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"noticia-titulo",children:noticia.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"noticia-descricao",children:noticia.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:noticia.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"noticia-link",children:"Leia mais"})]},index))})]});};export default Noticias;
